name: Snowcap
description: Another West Coast strain that has developed quite a legacy for itself, Snowcap is a potent sativa with a nice lemony scent with a hint of menthol. The effects are decidedly cerebral and should trigger creativity, happiness, and a case of the giggles. Believed to be a hybrid of Humbolt Snow and an unknown Haze, the poorly documented genetic history leaves some mystery surrounding Snowcap. One thing consumers will agree on is the all-around flavor and potency of this robust strain.
attributes_title: Energetic, Uplifted, Euphoric, Happy, Creative, Stress, Depression, Pain, Headaches, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Dizzy, Anxious, Dry Eyes
